markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Intimidating Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=4782) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=68" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 77 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Battle Harbinger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=304) (Level 4), [Blackjacket](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=316) (Level 4)

</column>

---

Your blow not only wounds creatures but also shatters their confidence. Make a melee Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is frightened 1, or frightened 2 on a critical hit.
name: Intimidating Strike

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 2" pfs="Standard" > Intimidating Strike Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 141 2.0 , Player Core 2 pg. 77 1.1 Archetypes Battle Harbinger (Level 4), Blackjacket (Level 4) --- Your blow not only wounds creatures but also shatters their confidence. Make a melee Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is frightened 1, or frightened 2 on a critical hit.
